definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: ren2 wen2 she4 hui4 xue2 ke1

sentences.english: Setting personal awards of science and technology is supported by the theory of sociology of science.
sentences.chinese: 科技個人獎設置得到科學社會學的理論支持。

sentences.english: Auditing as a social-science discipline, has its own hypotheses as well.
sentences.chinese: 審計學作爲一門社會學科，也有其自身的審計假設。

sentences.english: In 1983, the Sociology Department at Chicago offered me a joint appointment.
sentences.chinese: 1983年，芝加哥大學社會學系給我一份邀請。

sentences.english: Since its first publication, The Felon has quickly become a classic of criminal sociology.
sentences.chinese: 自第一次發表後，弗隆已迅速成爲社會學的經典犯罪。

sentences.english: This essay tries to analyze her views on marriage and their significance of reality from historical sociology angle.
sentences.chinese: 從歷史社會學的角度分析了她的婚姻觀及其現實意義。

sentences.english: Simmel is considered to be the first sociologist who starts to research modernity.
sentences.chinese: 齊美爾被認爲是研究現代性的第一位社會學家。

sentences.english: I contemplated transferring to sociology, but found that subject too difficult.
sentences.chinese: 我計劃轉向社會學，但是發現這門學科太難了。

sentences.english: Last year I studied sociology and political science in school.
sentences.chinese: 去年，我在學校攻讀了社會學和政治學課程。

sentences.english: This is a case-study in the field of sociology .
sentences.chinese: 這是一項社會學的個案研究。

sentences.english: This most pays attention by the ecology educational world and the social educational world.
sentences.chinese: 這其中以生態學界和社會學界最爲關注。

sentences.english: Tashi then went on to the University of New Delhi to gain a Bachelor of Arts degree in Sociology.
sentences.chinese: 後來扎西赴新德里大學取得社會學學士。

sentences.english: And this wisdom is increasingly supported by scientific and sociological research.
sentences.chinese: 這種智慧漸漸的被科學和社會學研究所證實。

sentences.english: What was and is the psychosocial significance of the hymen?
sentences.chinese: 處女膜的心理社會學意義是什麼和曾經是什麼？

sentences.english: The second part discusses the content of T'ung-tsu ch'ü's sociology methodology of the legal history.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分討論瞿同祖法律史社會學方法論的主要內容。

sentences.english: All this as you say form the education sociology theory of HEIC.
sentences.chinese: 這些，構成了農村高等教育的教育社會學理論。

sentences.english: In sociology, the Matthew effect (or accumulated advantage) is the phenomenon where "the rich get richer and the poor get poorer".
sentences.chinese: 在社會學中，馬太效應是指富者越富，窮着更窮。
